title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Southern Lebanon: Key Military Actions Explained”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

In five different areas in southern Lebanon; the IDF attacked Hezbollah terror targets throughout the night, targeting the launch site from which the fire was directed at Shatila yesterday.

During the night, Air Force aircraft targeted a truck in the Ayta a-Shab area that carried the launch site used for the fire at Shatila yesterday.

Additionally, Air Force fighter jets attacked several military sites in the Rab a-Talatin and al-Adaysa areas.

At the same time, a Hezbollah observation post was attacked in the Ramia area, alongside a military infrastructure used by the organization in the al-Khiam area. IDF forces also conducted artillery strikes in additional areas in southern Lebanon to remove the threat.

Attached is documentation from the strikes: https://bit.ly/4bDNLRm
